A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was awesome\, stylish with the right mix of funny and sad moments and that certain Star Wars magic. I love the diversity. It's not catering to some \"PC agenda\"\, its just a more accurate reflection of a galaxy that also contains women (including those of different ages) and people of different skin colours and ethnicity. Having representation of these groups in such kick ass roles is powerful. For the people out there that are fuelling the backlash because its overly \" PC\"- I would imagine that you have never missed seeing someone like you on screen doing inspirational stuff. You don't realise how awesome it is because you've never felt the lack.
